channel.title: Lyrics on A minimal Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Lyrics on A minimal Hugo website

item.title: Made Off... Dont Stray
item.description: My kind’s your kind I’ll stay the same Pack up Don’t stray Oh say say say Oh say say say Wait, they don’t love you like I love you

item.title: Mark David Chapman by T.O.D.
item.description: We pierced the side of the idol With the sharpened neck of an electric guitar Bottled the water from the wound Holy relic- the essence of star But what does she care, it’s just another blank stare to a world that loves and hates you on a dare Where the orphans ask the widows the meaning of ‘fair’ So let this be a drink to quench this uncontrollable thirst

item.title: That Means No...
item.description: … where I come from. I am cold, out waiting for the day to come

item.title: Sawdust and Diamonds
item.description: And the moment I slept, I was swept up in a terrible tremor Though no longer bereft, how I shook! And I couldn’t remember Then the furthermost shake drove a murthering stake in And cleft me right down through my center And I shouldn’t say so, but I knew that it was then, or never

item.title: The Stillness is the Move
item.description: After all that we’ve been through I know that I will always love you > From now until forever baby… I can’t imagine anything better After all that we’ve been through! I know we’ll make it, I know the way The question is it true There is nothing we can’t do I see you along the way baby…

item.title: I Luv the Valley... Oh!!!
item.description: It’s a pill and you’ve got to take it. It’s a pill that you’ve got to take… It’s a pill and you’ve got to take it <head> <title>I won't rest until you take it</title> </head> That’s a heart that you made

item.title: For 29 years before I saw you...
item.description: Standing at the punch table swallowing punch Can’t pay attention to the sound of anyone… A little more stupid, a little more scared Every minute more unprepared I made a mistake in my life today Everything I love gets lost in drawers I want to start over, I want to be winning Way out of sync from the beginning I wanna hurry home to you $ Put on a slow, dumb show for you and crack you up So you can put a blue ribbon on my brain God, I’m very, very frightening, I’ll overdo it

item.title: Fly like paper get high like planes...
